stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email Uses URL to Deliver CryptoLocker Variant
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 4 August 2014 a phishing email containing a malicious URL was observed. The malicious URL payload includes a possible CryptoLocker variant. The email was sent using the address "support@aus-post.org" and had the parcel delivery theme.
